description: Evaluation suite for unified search across clients and documents in a wealth management context

clients.description: Retired tech executive. High risk tolerance. Matriarch of Jones family.
New client. Entrepreneur. Moderate risk tolerance.
Smith Family Office. Conservative growth. ESG focus.
Entrepreneur. Recently exited startup. Focusing on philanthropy.
Trustee for Chen Global Trust. Intergenerational wealth transfer focus.
Private Equity Partner. Complex tax situation with multiple K-1s.

documents.title: Risk Profile Questionnaire 2024
documents.content: Client indicates high tolerance for volatility. Investment horizon: 20+ years. Primary goal: Capital appreciation over preservation. Experience: Sophisticated investor.

documents.title: Risk Profile Questionnaire 2024 - Doe
documents.content: Client prefers balanced approach. Investment horizon: 10-15 years. Goal: Growth and Income.

documents.content:
ELECTRICITY BILL
Customer: John Doe
Service Address: 456 Maple Avenue, Toronto, ON M5V 2T6
Billing Date: Oct 01 2023
This document serves as proof of residence.

documents.title: Smith Family IPS 2023
documents.content:
INVESTMENT POLICY STATEMENT
Target Allocation: 40% Equities, 60% Fixed Income.
Liquidity Constraints: $500k monthly cash requirement.
ESG Mandate: No investments in tobacco, firearms, or fossil fuel extraction companies.
Performance Benchmark: 60/40 Blended Index.

documents.title: Q3 2023 Portfolio Review
documents.content: Portfolio performance: +4.2%. Current Allocation: 45% Equity, 55% Fixed Income (Drift noted). Holdings include: Apple, Microsoft, Tesla, GreenEnergy ETF. No prohibited assets detected.

documents.title: Meeting Note - Oct 12 2023
documents.content: Met with David at the club. He mentioned he is considering buying a vineyard in France next summer (2024). Wants to discuss liquidity for a â‚¬2M down payment. Also expressed concern about tech sector overexposure.

documents.title: Call Summary - Dec 05 2023
documents.content: David called to update beneficiary details. His daughter Emily is turning 18 soon. He wants to set up a separate trust for her education.

documents.title: Chen Global Trust - Deed of Settlement
documents.content:
TRUST DEED
Settlor: Li Chen
Trustees: Global Trust Co.
Beneficiaries: Lucas Chen (Son), Emily Chen (Daughter), and future lineal descendants.
Distribution Rules: Principal accessible only after beneficiaries reach age 30.

documents.title: Last Will and Testament - Li Chen
documents.content: I, Li Chen, residing in New York, hereby declare... All personal property to spouse. Residual estate to pour over into the Chen Global Trust.
